
?ExprX $=< ?ExprY

   ExprX is less than or equal to ExprY.

Arguments
   ExprX               Arithmetic expression
   ExprY               Arithmetic expression

Type
   library(ic)

Description

   Constrains ExprX to be less than or equal to ExprY.  Alternate form of
   ic:(ExprX =< ExprY).


See Also
   =< / 2
